tr.td: Body weights, body weight gains, age of attainment of vaginal opening and weight at day of attainment are presented in Table 3 below. This table is MANDATORY.

g:HTMLPanel.div: TABLE 3. General Growth and Vaginal Opening (VO)a

w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.name: {GDStr.getPath}
w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p:
a Data were obtained from page [#] of the study report, and are the average of [#] female rats per dose group.
* Significantly different from controls at p < 0.05.
U = Unadjusted for body weight on PND 22. A = Adjusted for body weight on PND 22. SD = Standard Deviation. CV = Coefficient of Variation. NA = Not applicable.
